item.title: Software Engineer
item.description: Full-Time • Charlottetown, PE Forestry.io is a small team, led by engineers, and based in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island. We are hiring a software engineer to help us build a Content Management System for the next generation of websites. We’re taking a developer-centric approach to content management by supporting modern tools like Git, Hugo and Jekyll. What You Will Do Develop a CMS that will allow our customers to build and edit the world’s best websites
